name: Kamelot the Demon Hunter
description:
Kamelot, a half human half demon, demon hunter is having a not so good day. She for once slept on a tree, she hadn’t had breakfast and her over all mood is not that great today.
But nothing that hanging out with one of her girlfriends won’t solve right?
Right?!
Kamelot the Demon Hunter is a game that is still currently in development, with more routes to be added in future updates!
The version available now is the base version, where you have two routes available for your reading pleasure.
Also, you can decide on which route will be implemented next! Just click on this link!
Which route should be implemented next?

This game is part of the Demon Hunter series, composed of other two games. You don’t need to play them to understand the story.

Content warnings: This game has mentions and moments of transphobia, mentions of death and suicide.
